headline: PayPal Expands Peer-to-Peer Payments With Bitcoin, Ethereum Integration – Exec Says It's the 'Next Major Step' in Global Money Movement
summary: PayPal (NASDAQ:PYPL) will "soon" integrate cryptocurrencies into its peer-to-peer payments system. ​ U.S. users will soon be able to send Bitcoin, Ethereum, PayPal USD and other supported cryptocurrencies across PayPal, Venmo and a growing list of ...
